com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IViewPropertyService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewPropertyService
public interface IViewPropertyService
extends IService

The interface for the ViewPropertyService class The ViewProperty service class provides remote services to manipuate View Property data.

Author:
Michelle Bachler

Method Summary

                           java.lang.String sUserID,
                           ViewProperty viewFrame)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new view property to the database and returns it if successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user creating ths view property.
ViewProperty - view, the ViewProperty object to create a record for.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

                           java.lang.String sUserID,
                           ViewProperty viewFrame)

Update a view property to the database and returns it if successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the userupdating this view property.
ViewProperty - view, the ViewProperty object to update the record for.
Returns:
boolean, true if the update was successful, else false.

java.sql.SQLException

deleteViewProperty

boolean deleteViewProperty(PCSession session,
                           java.lang.String sUserID,
                           java.lang.String sViewID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
Deletes a view property from the database and returns true if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user updating this view property.
String - sViewID, the id of the view for the view property to delete.
Returns:
boolean, true if the update was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getViewPosition

ViewProperty getViewPosition(PCSession session,
                             java.lang.String UserID,
                             java.lang.String ViewID)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
Get the view property record for the given user and view id.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user whose view property to return.
String - sViewID, the id of the view for the view property to return.
Returns:
ViewProperty, the ViewProperty record for the user id and view id given.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
